tasks.task: Identify and describe top meat goat breeds.
subtasks: Research Varada breed origin and size.
Note Varada's climate adaptability and care requirements.
Mention Sarohi goat's Indian origin and hardiness.
Highlight Rangeland breed's Australian origin and dry-weather tolerance.
Describe Nugent goat's dual-purpose traits and weight.
Identify Cacao goat's breeding origins and characteristics.
Mention Kiko goats' hardiness and mothering skills.
Describe Kali Hari goat's size and South African origin.
Highlight Black Bengal goat's meat quality and popularity.
